articles.title: Power returns to Spain and Portugal. The outage’s cause remains a mystery - AP News
articles.description: Electricity has returned to Spain and Portugal, but the cause of Monday's widespread blackout remains a mystery. It was one of Europe’s most severe blackouts. Spanish news agency EFE says authorities on Tuesday are investigating five deaths that could be rela…
articles.content:
MADRID (AP) The cause of Spain and Portugals widespread blackouts remained a mystery on Tuesday, with some isolated disruption remaining after power was largely restored.

articles.title: OnePlus won’t sell the 13T in the US or Europe - The Verge
